WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed.Available now optimizes to exactly the Poison Hit cap and 2 over the Exp cap.Pungkrull now optimizes to 52 Hit over the Poison cap and the exact Exp cap.
WorkItem.Description:
In my current gear set up, attached below, Rawr Rogue is telling me the optimal gem set is with agility and Hit (all the way to 455 hit..) with 1-2 Ap gems mixed in.
However, the other spreadsheets on EJ shows AP and haste as the prominent gem in almost all set ups.
Any ideas as to why?
WorkItem.Summary: [Rogue] Assasination rogue gemming hit and agility, other simulacraft show AP and haste.

Comments.Message:
I saw a big difference too, especially compared to the .20 version. Here are my weights for the attached rogue.

.21
Agility - 2,97
Hit Rating - 2,78
Crit Rating - 2,53
Haste Rating - 2,48
Ar Pen Rating - 2,40
Strength - 1,67
Attack Power - 1,50

.20
Agility - 1,68
Hit Rating - 2,55
Crit Rating - 0,83
Haste Rating - 2,48
Ar Pen Rating - 1,66
Strength - 1,41
Attack Power - 1,26
Notice that my rogue is Pungkrull and shadowchao's rogue is Available
The reason for this is that it overvalues critting at the moment, I have not found the cause for it yet.
